A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a tough one. I don't think it was bad at all\, but I still greatly enjoyed Force Awakens much more. The opening scene was very entertaining\, but once it got into the second act I legitimately got bored in a Star Wars movie. When the third act kicks in however\, I was like\, \"Hey\, now I'm getting into it.\" So\, overall\, i didn't enjoy the second act\, but I still thought it was a good entry in the Star Wars saga.
